intro: ^! Hitting the books? Or are you tutoring someone?"

s: ^If I hit any books Rashad would never allow me in the library again.
^Hi Elisa! I think my tutoring days are over, I can barely remember where I put my coffee.

Chat1: ^Elisa?Smiling "Hah. Well, I'm sure you'll be fine. You're usually happy to keep everything together. How's the Block party coming along?"

s: ^It's going pretty well! I got a cotton candy machine, so you know I'm in heaven.
^It's going pretty well, actually. I popped by to ask Rashad something, but you might be able to help.

Chat2: ^Elisa?Smiling "Cotton candy? You sound way too excited for cotton candy. I thought only kids were this excited."

s: ^Look, Elisa, here is some advice from the other side. You never get too old to be excited about sugar on a stick. Or any food on a stick.
^Well, maybe I just never grew up. Hmm.  I popped by to ask Rashad something, but you might be able to help.

Chat3: ^Elisa?Smiling "Okay, fair. I do love corndogs. And Satay. And- okay food on a stick is pretty great."

s: ^See?! Never too old for food on a stick. You know, I stopped by to ask Rashad something, but you might be able to help.

Explain1: ^Elisa?Neutral "Oh cool? Is it about food on a stick, or something else?"

s: ^Definitely somehting else. I've got a tech question.

Explain2: ^Elisa?Neutral "A tech question? And you didn't just look it up? Or watch a video?"

s: ^It's not for me, it's for Mother Calindas. She needs some help with technology.
^Oh no, I'm looking for some senior tech classes in Spanish or Tagalog. Mother Calindas needs some hands-on help. Do you know anything?

Suggestion1: ^Elisa?Smiling "Well, when I taught my abuela, we made sure to just turn on the largest font size so she could read everything clearly."
^Elisa_Day 3_Providing accessible devices with large fonts can help

Suggestion1.#: notification Elisa_Day 3_Providing accessible devices with large fonts can help

s: ^Oh, that sounds helpful. But I think I'm looking for some classes she could join or a tutor. Do you know anything like that?
^That's a pretty great idea. I'll tell Mr. Calindas that would help.

Suggestion2: ^Elisa?Smiling "Oh, yeah. The internet can be really overwhelming for seniors. If you want you can have Mr. Calindas email me and I can help her here at the library."
^Elisa?Smiling "Like a tutor. We can do it all in Spanish too."
^Elisa_Day 3_The internet and new tech can be overwhelming for seniors_Mrcalindas3

Suggestion2.#: notification Elisa_Day 3_The internet and new tech can be overwhelming for seniors_Mrcalindas3

Suggestion2: ^Elisa_Day 3_Elisa is willing to teach some basic tech in Spanish_Mrcalindas3

Suggestion2.#: notification Elisa_Day 3_Elisa is willing to teach some basic tech in Spanish_Mrcalindas3

s: ^That's such a great idea, Elisa. Is there anything else we should keep in mind?
^You're so generous, Elisa. I'll have Mr. Calindas email you.

Goodbye: ^Elisa?Smiling "Sure, no problem. I hope Mother Calindas is settling in okay. Anyway, I'm going to check these out. See ya!"
